command.name: cd()
command.helptext: Return the current directory.

command.name: cd($0)
command.helptext: Change directory to the directory given as a string. Ex: cd("myModels/myLibrary").

command.name: clear()
command.helptext: Clear everything.

command.name: clearVariables()
command.helptext: Clear the variables.

command.name: help()
command.helptext: Print this helptext (returned as a string).

command.name: instantiateModel($0)
command.helptext: Instantiates a model/class and returns a string containing the flat class definition. Ex: instantiateModel(dcmotor).

command.name: list()
command.helptext: Return a string containing all class definitions.

command.name: list($0)
command.helptext: Return a string containing the class definition of the named class. Ex: list(dcmotor).

command.name: listVariables()
command.helptext: Return a vector of the currently defined variable names.

command.name: loadFile($0)
command.helptext: Load modelica file given as string argument. Ex: loadFile("../myLibrary/myModels.mo").

command.name: loadModel($0)
command.helptext: Load model, function, or package relative to $OPENMODELICALIBRARY. Ex: loadModel(Modelica.Electrical). Note: if e.g. loadModel(Modelica) fails, you may have OPENMODELICALIBRARY pointing at the wrong location.

command.name: plot($0)
command.helptext: Plot a variable from the most recently simulated model. Ex: plot(x).

command.name: plot($0)
command.helptext: Plot variables from the most recently simulated model given as a vector. Ex: plot({x,y}).

command.name: plotParametric($0, $1)
command.helptext: Plot var2 relative to var1 from the most recently simulated model. Ex: plotParametric(x,y).

command.name: readFile($0)
command.helptext: Load file given as string and return a string of the file content. Ex: readFile("myModel/myModelr.mo").

command.name: readSimulationResultSize($0)
command.helptext: Return the size of the record resulting from a simulation. The size is read from the result file, given as a string. Ex: readSimulationResultSize("dcmotor_res.plt").

command.name: readSimulationResult($0, $1, $2)
command.helptext: Read the results of a simulation from a file named by the string argument strFile. Here size is the size of the resulting record and variables is a vector of the variables to investigate. Ex: readSimulationResult("dcmotor_res.plt", {R1.i,L1.v}, 10).

command.name: runScript($0)
command.helptext: Exectute script file (.mos) given as string argument. Ex: runScript("simulation.mos").

command.name: saveModel($0, $1)
command.helptext: Save the model/class with name modelname in the file given by the strFile string argument.

command.name: simulate($0, startTime=$1, stopTime=$2, numberOfIntervals=$3, tolerance=$4)
command.helptext: Translates a model and simulates it. Ex: simulate(dcmotor). Ex: simulate(dcmotor,startTime=0, stopTime=10, numberOfIntervals=1000).

command.name: system($0)
command.helptext: Execute str as a system(shell) command, return integer success value. Ex: system("touch myFile").

command.name: timing($0)
command.helptext: Evaluates expression and returns the number of seconds the evaluation took. Ex: timing(x*4711+5).

command.name: typeOf($0)
command.helptext: Returns the type of the variable as a string. Ex: typeOf(R1.v).

command.name: quit()
command.helptext: Leave OpenModelica and kill the process.
